price: Ya ku mutãne! Lalle wa'azi yã jẽ muku daga Ubangijinku, da waraka ga abin da yake a cikin ƙirãza, da shiriya da rahama ga muminai.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāatkum mawʿiẓatun min rabbikum washifāon limā fī al-ṣudūri wahudan waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna
